de.dirkgasser.brauen

Class BrewStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dirkgasser.brauen.BrewStep

  • public class BrewStep
extends java.lang.Object
    A BrewStep is an action in a BrewRecipe
    It consists of temperature and duration and a list of all ingredients
    which are put in in this step

    • Constructor Detail

      • BrewStep

        public BrewStep(java.lang.String description,
                java.util.List<Ingredient> ingredients,
                java.lang.Integer duration,
                java.lang.Boolean manual,
                java.lang.Integer temperatur)
        Parameters:
        description - Description/Name of this BrewStep
        ingredients - List of Ingredients which are put in in this step
        duration - Duration of BrewStep in minutes
        manual - true = start of step requires manual confirmation
        temperatur - temperatur of this step
